overview: Ever fancied the geezer who's stretched out over the pool table with his arse in the air to pot an awkward ball? Well there's loads of arse-cheek splitting shags in Triga's Pool Room Scallies, and plenty of ball banging action as ten scally lads shove their rock-hard pool cues where the sun don't shine and gag on some award-winning spunk shots.
title: Pool Room Scallies
